item.title: Emily add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Emily add a quote by William Shakespeare
Emily add a quote by Emily Mann
item.description: "When a theater goes dark for the night, a stagehand leaves a lighted lamp on stage. No one knows why any more, but some old timers say it is to keep the ghosts away. Others say it lights the stage for the ghosts to play. Whichever theory one adheres to, most people agree: a great theater is haunted." -- Emily Mann

item.title: Emily add a quote by Christina Baldwin
item.description: "Journal writing is a voyage to the interior." -- Christina Baldwin
